name: Hydrating Facial Cleanser
description: A gentle, hydrating cleanser that removes impurities without stripping the skin's natural moisture.
howToUse: Apply to damp skin, massage gently, and rinse thoroughly with warm water.

name: Vitamin C Brightening Serum
description: Powerful antioxidant serum that brightens skin tone, reduces dark spots, and boosts collagen production.
howToUse: Apply 3-4 drops to clean, dry skin in the morning before moisturizer and sunscreen.

name: Retinol Night Cream
description: Advanced night cream with retinol to reduce fine lines, wrinkles, and improve skin texture while you sleep.
howToUse: Apply a pea-sized amount to clean, dry skin in the evening. Start using 2-3 times per week and gradually increase frequency.

name: Exfoliating AHA/BHA Toner
description: Dual-action exfoliating toner with AHAs and BHAs to remove dead skin cells, unclog pores, and improve skin clarity.
howToUse: Apply to clean skin with a cotton pad, avoiding the eye area. Use in the evening 2-3 times per week.

name: Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum
description: Intensive hydrating serum with multiple forms of hyaluronic acid to plump and hydrate all skin layers.
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to damp skin after cleansing, morning and evening. Follow with moisturizer.

name: Niacinamide & Zinc Pore Refining Serum
description: Balancing serum that reduces excess oil, minimizes pores, and improves skin texture and tone.
howToUse: Apply a few drops to clean skin morning and evening before moisturizer.

name: Peptide Eye Cream
description: Advanced eye cream with peptides to reduce fine lines, dark circles, and puffiness around the delicate eye area.
howToUse: Apply a small amount around the orbital bone using your ring finger, morning and evening.

name: Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50
description: Lightweight, non-greasy mineral sunscreen that provides broad-spectrum protection without leaving a white cast.
howToUse: Apply generously to face and neck as the final step in your morning skincare routine. Reapply every 2 hours when exposed to sun.

name: Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment Gel
description: Targeted treatment gel that reduces acne, unclogs pores, and calms inflammation without over-drying the skin.
howToUse: Apply a thin layer to affected areas after cleansing, up to twice daily.

name: Ceramide Barrier Repair Cream
description: Rich, nourishing cream that restores the skin barrier, locks in moisture, and soothes irritation.
howToUse: Apply to clean skin morning and evening. Can be used as needed for extra hydration.

name: Glycolic Acid Resurfacing Mask
description: Weekly treatment mask that exfoliates, brightens, and improves skin texture for a radiant complexion.
howToUse: Apply an even layer to clean, dry skin. Leave on for 10-15 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Use 1-2 times per week.

name: Squalane Facial Oil
description: Lightweight, non-comedogenic facial oil that hydrates, softens, and balances the skin without clogging pores.
howToUse: Apply 2-4 drops to skin after water-based serums and before or mixed with moisturizer.
